sentences.english: TT: Trachomatous Trichiasis. At least one eyelash rubs on the eyeball.
sentences.chinese: 沙眼性倒睫，至少一根睫毛摩擦眼球。

sentences.english: It is caused by the chlamydia trachomatis bacterium.
sentences.chinese: 它是由沙眼衣原体细菌。

sentences.english: According to the symptoms, your trouble is trachoma.
sentences.chinese: 根据这些症状判断，您患的是沙眼。

sentences.english: What can be done to prevent and control trachoma and eliminate it as a cause of blindness?
sentences.chinese: 怎样预防和控制沙眼以及防止其导致失明？

sentences.english: Trachoma is transmitted person-to-person by ocular and respiratory secretions.
sentences.chinese: 沙眼通过眼睛和呼吸道分泌物在人群中传播。

sentences.english: Objective Aim To evaluate three laboratory diagnosis of Chlamydia trachomatis infection of urogenital tract.

sentences.english: What are the symptoms of trachoma?
Objective To look into the relation between genital Chlamydia trachomatis infection and infertility.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨生殖道沙眼衣原体感染与不育症的关系。

sentences.english: Make trachoma decrease to lowest degree, messenger product quality improves thereby greatly.
sentences.chinese: 使沙眼减少到最低的程度，从而使产品质量大大提高。

sentences.english: Research on C. t vaccine is the key point of prevention measures.
sentences.chinese: 沙眼衣原体疫苗的研究便是预防措施中的重点之一。

definition: dry eye/xerophthalmia (drying of the tear glands, often due to lack of vitamin A)
eye floaters (moving spots in the eye's vitreous humor)
